oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clothing Workers Rebel
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Union Organization, Other Unions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Federal troops entering Ludlow. Second Panel: Rank and file United Garment Workers members organizing a rebellion within the union. Third Panel: UGW officers planning to bar rebellious members from their 1913 convention.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
